title: JOB Tax Credit Act
content: Jobs and Opportunity Bonus Tax Credit Act of 2014 or the JOB Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allownbsp. Employers who employ not more than 500 full-time employees during the taxable year a business-related tax credit equal to the lesser of: (1) 50 of the job training programnbsp, expenditures for a full-timenbsp. Employee participating in a qualified training program, or (2) $5,000. Terminates such credit after 2017.
